alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:45AM CST until January 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 4.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to flood stage tomorrow morning. It will rise to 4.1 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall to flood stage Thursday morning. It will rise to 4.1 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.8 Tue 5 am CST 4.1 4.1 4.0 &&
